lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace manager Alan Pardew celebrated the 3-0 win over Southampton that ended the club's dismal run of form on Saturday by thanking chairman Steve Parish for his support.

headline.print_headline: Winner Pardew Thanks Palace Chairman Parish for His Support
headline.main: Winner Pardew Thanks Palace Chairman Parish for His Support
